description:
toodleTasks HD is a task management application for HP webos that sync with toodledo (www.toodledo.com)
* Manage your lists (projects, contexts, goals, location) and view tasks by lists
* Manage your tasks (name, project, context, goal, location, due date, due time, reminder, repeat, priority, tags, status, notes)
* Create and manage subtasks (with a toodledo pro account)
* Filter and sort tasks
* Quick-add tasks
* Full text search
* Actions on multiple tasks (assign to a list, mark complete, star, delete,...)
* Add tasks and search for tasks with "just type"
* Auto-Sync at startup and when the app is closed
* Experimental support for background sync

toodleTasks make it easy to manage your tasks and todo or implement David Allen's GTD methodology on webos.

toodleTasks HD has been reviewed on Pre|Central, ZDNet and many other. Go to www.prodisoft.ch for a full list of reviews

see toodleTasks Phone Edition for webOS Phones!
versionNote:
New Option to clone an existing task (see new icon in the right panel)
Support for start Date (can be activated in preferences&accounts then use  'Hide future tasks' in the menu to hide tasks with a start date in the future)
Fix a bug with syncing when the 'tags' field was disabled
toodleTasks Phone Edition for webOS phones (with webOS 2.1.1) is now available in the App Catalog
